title.en: Merched y Wawr First Meeting of West Glamorgan Area Committee
title.cy: Pwyllgor Cyntaf Rhanbarth Gorllewin Morgannwg Merched y Wawr 1970

description.en:
Ffotograff Pwyllgor Cyntaf Rhanbarth Gorllewin Morgannwg 1970. Cefn - Margaret Jones, Maesteg / Rae Morris, Treboeth / Doris Evan, Lôn Las, Jean Williams, Porthcawl / Heulwen Mary Evans, Glynnedd / Megan Howells, Penybont-ar-Ogwr / Valerie Jones, Abertawe / Beti Scourfield, Abertawe 
Blaen – Morina Roberts, Castellnedd (Trysorydd) / Wendy Richards, Castellnedd (Ysgrifennydd) / Barbara Phillips, Treboeth / Marged Jones, Llywydd Cenedlaethol / Mary Connick, Glynnedd / Sylvia Rees, Lôn Las (Llywydd)
